item.description: Wow! Another great Single Mingle option today! Fundraiser to benefit the Make-A-Wish Foundation. 7:00 - 11:00 pm. for $10.00. A buffet, line dance lessons, Two Step, Swing and Partner line dancing with both country and non-country music to dance to. There will be a few raffles. Tickets available at the door. OK, so it's not really on the 5th of May but it's close. If you need another reason to come out to dance, Cinco De Mayo celebrates the initial victory of Mexican forces over the French in the Battle of Puebla on May 5, 1862.
item.how_to_find_us: I will either be at a table with a meetup sign or in the foyer
item.why: It's inexpensive, local, and it's for a good cause. Besides, dancing is fun and healthy.
item.name: Cinco de Mayo Buffet and Dance
